place_of_publication.publication_title: Publ. Field Mus. Nat. Hist., Bot. Ser.

treatment.description: Stems stipitate-glandular distally, internodes 4–6(–10) cm. Leaf blades 50–90 × 10–25(–40) mm. Peduncles 4–8+ cm. Phyllaries: outer ± oblong to ovate, 2–4+ mm, inner ovate-oblong to ovate-attenuate, 7–9 mm; all ± stipitate-glandular abaxially. Ray laminae 10–15+ mm. Disc corollas 5–6 mm, tubes stipitate-glandular. Cypselae 3–4 mm; pappus bristles 4–5 mm.
